item.title: OpenCV Robot
item.description: Robot Main components: Web Cam Raspberry Pi 3 Arduino Uno USB-TTL converter 4 wheels with motors 2x 18650 batteries motor expansion board Launch The device we are going to connect to must be on the same network(Wi-Fi) with Raspberry Pi. Download the project repository: git clone https://github.com/TMichaelan/embedded-systems-project.git Install requirements pip install -r requirements launch the application cd embedded-systems-project python3 app.py -i (ip-adress rasberry pi) -p (port) -s (UART) or in the file settings.

item.title: About
item.description: Software developer with 4+ years of experience in both front-end and back-end web development, focusing primarily on the back-end. Proficient in Python, Django, and Django Rest Framework, with a strong background in building and maintaining web applications, setting up CI/CD pipelines, and automating testing procedures. Fluent in Polish, English, and Russian
